item.title: Creatures Of Sonaria Codes (November 2025)
item.content:encoded:
Use these Roblox Creatures Of Sonaria monthly redeem codes for November 2025 to get your hands on plenty of free rewards, including Cash, new signature looks, and much more. 

Ever dreamt of soaring through the skies like one of the massive dragons from Game Of Thrones? If so, then Creatures Of Sonaria is a game that you need to check out immediately. Creatures Of Sonaria is a popular survival RPG experience on Roblox where players take on the roles of various mythical beings. Although many Roblox games tend to be quite basic and generic in their gameplay, Creatures Of Sonaria is a welcome change to that frustrating trend. With a highly immersive world full of secrets to explore, this game has something for every kind of player. 

To start, the Creatures Of Sonaria map is absolutely massive, featuring various terrains and atmospheres. Simply exploring every nook and cranny of the map will take players plenty of time. Another element of the game that makes it highly immersive is the fact that there are over 300 playable creatures. Not only that, but each of these beings also has its own individual abilities and unique traits, making the gameplay experience highly customizable. There’s also a solid Gacha system in the game, which players can use to get new and powerful beasts. 

Active Creatures Of Sonaria Codes 

  • COSYEAR5: Calacatta Marble Signature Look (NEW)

Expired Creatures Of Sonaria Codes

  • DIS25
  • COSBILLION
  • CAMPFIRECAMPOUT
  • EMBEREXTRAVAGANZA
  • 2024CAMPFIRE10
  • CAMPFIREASHES
  • astralredeem2024
  • AstralAscension
  • REVERSEDEATH
  • GrowBig
  • ANGELICSHELPER
  • IShatteredHim
  • IllPerfectSonaria
  • DollfaceYoutuber
  • SeekMe
  • MomotaYouTuber
  • ArbyYoutuber
  • RebusIsMine
  • ZotoYoutuber
  • WELCOMETORECODE

How To Redeem Creatures Of Sonaria Codes

Redeeming codes in Creatures Of Sonaria is a simple process that doesn’t require the player to expend too much time or energy. It’s as simple as navigating through the menus and inputting one of the active codes listed above into the correct text box. For players who may be new to the Roblox ecosystem, however, here’s a detailed step-by-step guide:

  1. Open Roblox and launch Creatures Of Sonaria.
  2. Click the Gift button on the bottom left of the screen.
  3. Enter one of the active codes given above into the text box.
  4. Click on the Redeem button to claim your rewards.

How To Get More Creatures Of Sonoria Codes

Creatures Of Sonaria codes are usually released during updates or events, and with just how popular the game is, the next set of code drops is surely only a matter of time. These codes are often released through the game’s official Discord server or Roblox page, so tracking both of these regularly is essential. However, to make our readers’ lives easier, we update this page with the latest codes as soon as they drop, so all you have to do to stay up to date with the newest codes is bookmark this page and check back in every so often.

Having fun using codes in Roblox games? Then check out the latest codes for 99 Nights in the Forest, Type Soul, and Azure Latch. Also, check out the Insider Gaming Discord server.

item.title: Best PC Games to Buy on Steam Holiday 2025
item.content:encoded:
Steam continues to be one of the best places to play games in 2025, and there’s an almost endless list of titles to enjoy, making it hard to find the best games.

Whether you’re on the hunt for your next source of multiplayer mayhem, an expansive single-player adventure, or a little bit of everything, Insider Gaming has listed the best games to buy on Steam, or gift to loved ones, in 2025.

Don’t forget to check out our other Holiday 2025 gift guides here!

Best PC Games to Buy on Steam 2025

Dispatch

The episode superhero adventure is arguably one of the best titles to release in a generation, putting you right in the mix of an Invincible-like story. Taking control of Robert Robertson, leading a pack of wannabe supervillain-turned-heroes seeking to be reformed, Dispatch’s eight-episode arc initially released weekly, but is perfect for playing in bulk, just like a binge watch of your favorite series.

Helldivers 2

If you’re yet to join the fight to defend democracy, where have you been? Helldivers 2 continues to shine as one of the best titles available on Steam, and the fact Xbox players joined the fight earlier this year means there’s even more crossplay fun to be had. While the game has regular updates like other live-service titles, the huge benefit is there’s no expiration to the Battle Passes, and plenty of ways to earn free credits.

ARC Raiders

The extraction shooter has made a quick impression since its release last month, standing as one of the best-reviewed games this week. Playable solo, or in teams up to three, one of ARC Raiders’ biggest strengths is the unpredictability every time you jump into the game, as you never know who you will come across. With ongoing support, ARC Raiders is here for the long haul.

Battlefield 6

After the much-maligned Battlefield 2042, EA has come back swinging with Battlefield 6, arguably the most successful title to release this year. While the solo campaign is entertaining, nothing beats the huge multiplayer battles on the ground and in the air, with naval combat expected in the future. If there’s any year to skip Call of Duty for something else, it’s this one.

Red Dead Redemption 2

It’s been seven years since Red Dead Redemption 2 was released on consoles and while it took a while longer to get to Steam, it still stands as one of the best games money can buy, and the current price has been slashed. Winner of over 175 Game of the Year awards, Red Dead Redemption 2 is the perfect game to tide you over until the release of Grand Theft Auto 6.

Baldur’s Gate 3

Baldur’s Gate 3 set the gaming world alight when it initially launched in 2023, clinching a well-deserved Game of the Year award, and the Dungeons & Dragons adventure is rated five stars on Steam to this day. Your choices along the way shape your adventure, meaning you’ll have a different experience on every run.

Palworld

Initially released in January 2024, Palworld caught the eye. and the ire of Nintendo, with its release, and has received several updates since, including some big collabs. With an array of Pals to capture, expansive base-building mechanics, and the ability to permanently trap humans in a small sphere for eternity, what’s not to love?

Forza Horizon 5

Despite turning four this year, Forza Horizon 5 still stands as the best racing game on the market, a title likely to be held onto until the release of Forza Horizon 6 next year. While racing is the name of the game, there’s plenty of other things to do, including exploration, stunt jumps, and listening to one of the best soundtracks available on any game on the market.

Black Ops 7

Black Ops 7 undoubtedly has its issues, but there are some major perks to the game. The biggest among them is Zombies, which is just as good, if not better, than Black Ops 6, with an expansive easter egg to complete on the initial map, along with more content on the way. There’s also intense multiplayer action and a frankly bizarre campaign to complete, which can be done solo with up to three other players.

Stardew Valley

Celebrating its tenth birthday next year, Stardew Valley continues to be one of the most-played titles on Steam and retains a five-star rating on the platform after a decade. Put in control of a run-down farm, players are tasked with bringing it back to life, growing crops and rearing animals. There’s also a mine to farm resources, a host of romance options, and plenty more secrets hidden away.

What titles would you place on your list of must-play games on Steam in 2025? Share your thoughts in the Insider Gaming Discord.

NOTE: Insider Gaming may earn affiliate commission if you purchase items through links on Insider Gaming. Read more about affiliate commission here.

item.title: World of Warcraft: Midnight Release Date Announced
item.content:encoded:
The long-awaited release date for the World of Warcraft: Midnight has finally been announced, with players able to enjoysome new features even sooner through early access.

World of Warcraft: Midnight’s opening cinematic was revealed at Gamescom to raise excitement, and players know now exactly how long they must wait until the expansion can be enjoyed.

World of Warcraft: Midnight Releases March 2

Blizzard announced that World of Warcraft: Midnight will be released worldwide on March 2, 2026, at 3 PM PST—which means that for some players in the world, the release date will be in the morning of March 3.

While there is still a little while to wait to enjoy everything that Midnight has to offer, players who have purchased any edition of the expansion can secure Housing Early Access next week, from December 2.

With the release of ‘The Warning’ Midnight Prologue content update, players who have purchased the Midnight expansion can join a neighborhood, choose a house, and begin customizing their new home during Housing Early Access.

Those without Midnight purchased can begin to add to their Housing collection through activities and achievements, however, which will be waiting for when you pull the trigger on the expansion and are ready to settle down into a humble abode.

Housing Early Access won’t provide everything there is to offer, however, with the available items described as a “limited selection before the full suite of options arrives with the launch of the expansion.”

Have you secured your purchase of World of Warcraft: Midnight? What house style are you planning on? Share your thoughts and designs in the Insider Gaming Discord.

For more news, read about Sledgehammer Games hiring candidates with Nintendo Switch experience for Call of Duty, and take a look at the latest ARC Raiders patch notes.

item.title: Fortnite Chapter 7 Will be Released Earlier Than Thought, It’s Claimed
item.content:encoded:
Fortnite is gearing up for this weekend’s huge end-of-chapter event, bringing an end to The Simpsons mini-season with a huge battle featuring collabs from throughout Chapter 6, and it seems downtime could end sooner than expected.

The Zero Point event in Fortnite takes place on Saturday at 2 PM PT, with Chapter 7 expected to kick off the following day, November 30. However, it’s claimed that the start date will be earlier.

Fortnite Chapter 7 Reportedly Releasing November 29

While the standard practice for major Fortnite updates is downtime beginning at 2 AM ET, which was expected to be the case with Chapter 7’s launch on November 30, players could be back in significantly earlier than that date.

Reliable leaker ShiinaBR states Chapter 7 will be released on November 29, “just a few hours after the live event.” While there’s no specific time mentioned, that could mean as much as 12 hours before downtime was expected to begin.

There are, however, some caveats to this, and even if the information is accurate, it would all depend on everything running smoothly in the deployment of Chapter 7.

Downtime for a new Chapter is often longer than the usual turnover for seasonal updates in Fortnite, and there’s a larger amount to deploy—including an entirely new map and POIs, NPCs, weapons, vehicles, and more.

That means there are even more things that could go wrong and extend downtime, and even if Epic Games were to publicly announce a release time, it would still be subject to change.

What is known, however, is that content creators have already gotten their hands on Chapter 7 during an early access event, with full details set to be shared ahead of the launch—which could become a standard approach for Epic Games, with a similar early access event ahead of The Simpsons mini-season.

What do you want to see added to Fortnite in Chapter 7? Share your thoughts in the Insider Gaming Discord.

For more Fortnite, read about the most expensive physical copy ever being sold, and check out details of an unseen Kill Bill chapter coming to the game.
